page.title: 08Our School Fete
page.content: Once a year, on a Saturday in May,our schools Bridge Farm Infant and Junior have a Fete.It is like a party held on the school field,but everyone pays money to come.The profit buys extra things for our schools,like the mini-bus,a disc-drive for the computer and library books. People can buy things like toys, books,comics and plants.They can have rides on the aerial toboggan,the coaster cars,the horse and cart and the roundabout. They can buy candy-floss,cakes,crisps and ice-cream to eat and tea and orange squash to drink.They can play games like Aunt Sally,Ring-a-Chicken and Hoopla. The infants enjoy the horse and cart rides and the roundabout rides most of all,but everyone has fun.The profit from the Fete this year was Â£800.
